alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Marshall; Panola; Pontotoc; Union; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 13 at 11:16PM CST until December 13 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lafayette County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Yalobusha County in northwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi... Southeastern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 1145 PM CST. * At 1116 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Burgess, or 9 miles west of Holly Springs National Forest, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oxford, Water Valley, Holly Springs National Forest, Cambridge, Etta, Springdale, Burgess, Bethlehem, Denmark, Pinedale, Thaxton, Potts Camp, Abbeville, Taylor, Malone, Keel, Esperanza, Waterford, Lake Center and College Hill Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Marshall; Panola; Pontotoc; Union; Yalobusha
